title: Endgame Sweep (Near-Certainty Capture)
mechanism: On Polymarket, the 'Endgame Sweep' strategy buys outcomes at 95-99c and holds to resolution for near-guaranteed profit. The edge comes from market friction and time value. In Kalshi, do trades at 95c+ still have edge after accounting for the rare upset?

proposed_signal.condition: YES price >= 95c AND market has <24 hours to resolution
proposed_signal.action: Buy YES (capture the last few cents)

novelty_vs_tested: S003 (NO at 90-100c) was INVALIDATED. This tests the OPPOSITE - buying YES at extreme high prices
